This page provides past events of the ThaiTeam.

== Trainings ==
list by chronologically 
 1. 4-5 April 2007 at <nowiki>[[http://www.egat.co.th/english/|Electricity Generating Authority of Thailand (EGAT)]]</nowiki> headquater, Bangkok <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntuclub.com/wiki/Training1|details]]</nowiki>
 2. 2-3 June 2007 at <nowiki>[[http://www.sipa.or.th|Software Industry Promotion Agency (SIPA)]]</nowiki>, Chiang Mai branch office <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntuclub.com/wiki/Training2|details]]</nowiki>
 3. 24 June 2007 at <nowiki>[[http://www.buu.ac.th/webeng/english.html|Burapha University]]</nowiki>, Chonburi in coressponding with <nowiki>[[http://www.osdev.co.th|OSDev]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntuclub.com/wiki/Training3|details]]</nowiki>
 4. 4 August 2007 at Mahanakorn Gypsum Building, Bangkok  <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntuclub.com/wiki/Training4|details]]</nowiki>
Photos from each trainings can be seen at <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntuclub.com/wiki/Training|Ubuntuclub Training page]]</nowiki>
